data.text: AND THE ONLY THING THAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU HAVE PEOPLE IN GOVERNMENT THAT LABELS ITS CITIZENS IS A SOCIETY DIVIDED, YOU CREATE ENEMIES AMONG THE PEOPLE WHEN THERE IS NO REAL BASIS FOR IT, ITS A MEANS OF CONTROL,

KANYE IS NOT ONLY A VOICE FOR THE BLACK COMMUNITY IN OUR GREAT CONSTITUTIONAL REPUBLIC HE IS A VOICE FOR ALL AMERICANS! BECAUSE AFTER ALL THATS WHAT WE ALL ARE AMERICANS, And His message is one that I wish the left would hear and embrace, BECAUSE THE LEFT LOVES TO LABEL EVERYONE
